findings.title: #1.Call with hardcoded gas amount.
findings.description: The contract forwards a fixed amount of gas which is discouraged as the gas cost of EVM instructions may change in the future, which could break this contract's assumptions.

findings.title: #2.Call with hardcoded gas amount.
findings.description: rewardsPool.transfer(reward BNB) forwards a fixed amount of gas. This is discouraged as the gas cost of EVM instructions may change in the future, which could break this contract's assumptions.
